movie.title: Shadow Island Mysteries The Last Christmas
movie.title_english: Shadow Island Mysteries The Last Christmas
movie.title_long: Shadow Island Mysteries The Last Christmas (2010)
movie.description_intro: Tycoon grandpa La Foret revives his family's traditional Christmas gathering at the lodge Claire manages for him, five years after it ceased with the mysterious lake drowning of his daughter Anne. But it's a one-off, as he has terminal cancer. The traditional treasure-hunt will now designate his sole major heir. The relatives can set aside their mutual conflicts and team up, or waste their chances. Grandpa dies during the game time, but Sergio Boniti, his Venetian new personal assistant, is authorized to supervise the game before the professionals arrive. However Anne's death haunts the game, which already has her memory as theme.
movie.description_full: Tycoon grandpa La Foret revives his family's traditional Christmas gathering at the lodge Claire manages for him, five years after it ceased with the mysterious lake drowning of his daughter Anne. But it's a one-off, as he has terminal cancer. The traditional treasure-hunt will now designate his sole major heir. The relatives can set aside their mutual conflicts and team up, or waste their chances. Grandpa dies during the game time, but Sergio Boniti, his Venetian new personal assistant, is authorized to supervise the game before the professionals arrive. However Anne's death haunts the game, which already has her memory as theme.

movies.title: The Perfect Storm
movies.summary: In October 1991, a confluence of weather conditions combined to form a killer storm in the North Atlantic. Caught in the storm was the sword-fishing boat Andrea Gail. Magnificent foreshadowing and anticipation fill this true-life drama while minute details of the fishing boats, their gear and the weather are juxtaposed with the sea adventure.

Magnificent foreshadowing and anticipation fill this true-life drama while minute details of the fishing boats, their gear and the weather are juxtaposed with the sea adventure.

movies.title: The First Purge
movies.summary: This horror/action-adventure film from director Gerard McMurray serves as a prequel that recounts events that led up to the first Purge event. To push the crime rate below one percent for the rest of the year, the New Founding Fathers of America (NFFA) test a sociological theory that vents aggression for one night in one isolated community.

movies.title: Hosts
movies.summary: A family fall victim to a series of violent murders when they invite their neighbours over for Xmas dinner.
movies.description_full: A family fall victim to a series of violent murders when they invite their neighbours over for Xmas dinner.
movies.synopsis: A family fall victim to a series of violent murders when they invite their neighbours over for Xmas dinner.

movies.title: Half White
movies.summary: In an alternate, xenophobic America, four immigrants must undergo white-face makeovers in order to secure employment at a software company.
movies.description_full: In an alternate, xenophobic America, four immigrants must undergo white-face makeovers in order to secure employment at a software company.
